original_text: And when the men of that place recognized him, they sent around to all that region and brought to him all who were sick
korean_text: 그 곳 사람들이 예수이신 줄을 알고 그 근방에 두루 통지하여 모든 병든 자를 예수께 데리고 와서

sentences.original_text: And when the men of that place recognized him
they sent around to all that region
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 그 온 지방에 두루 알렸다

sentences.original_text: and brought to him all who were sick
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 아픈 모든 사람을 그에게 데려왔다
